title: Pigsty - Novel Updates
tags: Bullying   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Modern Day   Sadistic Characters   Short Story   Torture   Tragic Past   Twisted Personality   Yandere
author: 纳兰翠花
description: The past him was gentle, confident, and strong. The him now had a blade in his mouth and couldn’t say a word. God, look at the world you’ve created, it’s like a pigsty. I beg you, even if you only spectate with cold eyes, don’t stand opposed to me.>
